channel.title: Ink & Ideals
channel.googleplay:author: Loyd Osborne
channel.author: Loyd Osborne
channel.itunes:author: Loyd Osborne
channel.description: Welcome to "Inside Mind" hosted by Loyd Osborne, the podcast where we fearlessly dive into mental health and those tough existential topics that are hard to navigate. Join Loyd as he has honest and raw conversations with experts and real people who have faced their inner demons, creating a safe space to be open and vulnerable. Get ready to explore the deep corners of the human mind, confront uncomfortable truths, and discover practical insights for self-discovery and growth. So, hop on board this transformative journey where we challenge norms, expand our understanding, and embrace the beautiful messiness of being human, one episode at a time.

item.author: Loyd Osborne
item.itunes:author: Loyd Osborne
item.title: Toxic vs. Precarious Masculinity (w/ Jonathon Reed)
item.description: Jonathon Reed joins me in talking about Men's Mental Health with topics such as the difference between Toxic and Precarious Masculinity, how societal norms have shaped the way men feel about mental health, and how you shouldn't feel bad about being vulnerable with others.

item.author: Loyd Osborne
item.itunes:author: Loyd Osborne
item.title: Cults in Relation to Religion (w/ Bea Cifra)
item.description: Bea Cifra joins me to discuss the very intricate nature of religion and the cults that stem from it. Listen as we discuss the manipulation cults use to recruit people like you and me, and personal experiences of our guest's past.

item.author: Loyd Osborne
item.itunes:author: Loyd Osborne
item.title: Life, Death, and The Afterlife (w/ Emmalee Phair)
item.description: I am joined by Emmalee Phair to discuss the unnerving truths and lack of understanding related to the afterlife. Join us on this journey as we talk about life, death, and our interpretations of life after death.
